title: FundusAdapter: few-shot adaptation of fundus image foundation model for fundus image diagnosis
details: Y Chang, Z Jiang, K Zhang, SK Zhou - Medical Imaging with Deep Learning-Short …, 2025
abstract: Fundus images exhibit significant source gaps, limiting the performance of foundation models across different scenarios. Due to the scarcity of labeled training data, few-shot adaptation is essential for effective diagnosis. However, existing few …
